testcase.name: Successfully book a room

testcase.system-out: Given I navigate to the website.............................................passed When I enter "John Doe" in the name text box................................passed And I enter "john.doe@example.com" in the email text box....................passed Then The text boxes should contain the entered values "John Doe" and "john.doe@example.com".passed
